title: Am I banned?
body: I accidentally 'named and shamed' on one of my posts, I guess. Basically, I recorded a highlight showing someone trolling. I realized I accidentally had their summoner names turned on and then tried to redo it. I finished, but when I made the post concerning it, the video I uploaded to youtube was the one WITH the names. I immediately deleted the post upon finding out. Noone watched the video, but there were 3 views on my post. Am I going to be punished for this? PLEASE HELP!{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

replies.body: No, we just delete and warn for first offences. Just be careful next time :)
Okay, thanks :') This relieved a lot of stress tbh
